mapper.select: select post.format_content,post.likes,post.meta_description,post.meta_keywords,post.summary,post.slug,post.id,post.title,post.create_time as createTime from post_tags posttag, posts post where posttag.id = #{tagid} and post.id = posttag.post_id and post.status = 0 and posttag.siteid=#{siteid} and post.siteid=#{siteid} limit #{start},10

select b.id,b.create_time as createTime ,b.update_time,b.name,b.slug,b.slug_name,b.thumbnail from post_tags a ,tags b where b.id=a.tag_id and a.post_id=#{post_id} and a.siteid=#{siteid} and a.siteid=b.siteid
select count(1) from post_tags where siteid=#{siteid} and tag_id=#{tag_id}
